alert.note: Alert for Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 09 at 11:10AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Montana, including the following counties, Fergus and Judith Basin. * WHEN...Until 230 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1108 AM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen over the last 24 hours in portions of the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hobson, Moore, Moccasin, Ackley Lake State Park, Buffalo, Danvers, Glengarry, Benchland and Garneill. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
